title: Banned for Club but can't access support ticket
body:
https://i.imgur.com/08KhSSw.png

I got permanently banned today and it wouldn't give me a reason until about an hour later in my email. I got banned for an inappropriate club tag and it says to respond to the ticket with names to change it to but I can't even access the support ticket so my account is just perma banned until I am able to access the buggy support ticket page.. any ideas?

this is what the support page looks like to me and I have tried everything.. https://i.imgur.com/8kqYRxd.png

replies.body: Hmmmm weird. That support page has been having some issues lately. Try opening up that ticket through your email, or you can send us one at support@riotgames.com
You should be able to just reply to the email they sent you to reply to the support ticket.
